synopsis.text:
Will ing to take risks to escape his mounting debt, Kaiji Itou finds himself trapped in a vicious cycle of gambling and despair. After a series of ill-fated bets, he is now indebted to the Teiai Corporation for an astronomical 9.5 million yen. Hoping for a chance to strike it big, Kaiji instead finds himself kidnapped by his old acquaintance, Yuuji Endou, who works for the very group he owes.

Kaiji is then sent to an underground labor camp, where he is forced to toil for years to repay his debt. Amongst other debtors and under the watchful eye of his cruel supervisor, Ohtsuki, Kaiji's only hope for escape is to participate in a high-stakes dice game called chinchirorin. As temptations threaten his meager earnings, Kaiji must navigate a treacherous world of deceit and betrayal, where the line between fool and thief is blurred.

With his future hanging in the balance, Kaiji must rely on his wits and courage to break free from this nightmarish world and find the elusive big score that will cancel all his debts. But as he delves deeper into the underworld of gambling, he will learn that the true cost of freedom may be more than he bargained for.
